products.title: Splash Solar Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash solar yellow 89mm vertical blind in yellow. Made to measure from 9.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash solar yellow is a bright and sunny yellow vertical blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous yellow vertical blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant! Their quality made to measure vertical blinds are a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Whether its fully closed, binge-watching the latest riveting tv drama, or letting the light in (but keeping your privacy), their vertical blinds are great for privacy and light control.Coming with sleek white components and quality-checked by their blind experts, quality is paramount. At swift direct blinds with over 50 years making and selling blinds under their belt, not only is this vertical blind made by the experts, it also comes with a fabulous five year guarantee - extra assurance that you are investing in quality that will stand the test of time.
 
 Product id: sdb-vtb1264 fabric colour: solar yellow material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable   slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Splash Rose Gold 89mm Vertical Blind
products.metadescription: Splash rose gold 89mm vertical blind in orange/pink. Made to measure from 9.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This 89mm vertical blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their splash rose gold vertical blinds are contemporary and stylish. A moisture-resistant rose gold fabric with a beautiful hue, makes this blind a great addition to a kitchen or bathroom. With a variety of control and stacking options available on their headrails, this blind can be easily tailored to work for any window.At swift direct blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first. This bespoke vertical blind comes with a 5 year guarantee, giving extra assurance that you are investing in piece that will stand the test of time
